prompt_base: photograph of an elegant, tall celestial woman, pale light-blue skin tone, long flowing white hair tied in a high ponytail, wearing intricate green and black divine silk robes, serene intelligent eyes, subtle gold jewelry
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, soft cinematic rim lighting, hyperdetailed texture on the silk robes, delicate subsurface scattering on the pale skin, sharp focus on facial features and hair structure
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, CGI, plastic texture, smooth skin, helmet hair, blurry fabric, stiff robes, humanoid proportions, flat lighting, low quality
